casebody.data:
Nicholas Conti v. Alfred Sistakauskas Alfred Sistakauskas v. Nicholas Conti (10119)

Nokcott, Foti and Doyle, Js.

Argued November 6 decision released November 26, 1991 Bryan F. Meccariello, for the appellant (defendant in the first case, plaintiff in the second case). Kenneth John Laska, for the appellee (plaintiff in the first case, defendant in the second case). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
